data.title: How to watch new Jim Henson documentary on Disney+
data.meta_description: Look into the mind of the man behind The Muppets, directed by Ron Howard.
data.text:
Get a fresh look into the mind of the man behind The Muppets. Puppeteer and creator Jim Henson is the fascinating subject in the new Disney+ documentary “Jim Henson Idea Man.” It is available to stream on Friday, May 31.

About the show:

"Jim Henson Idea Man" invites viewers into the mind of the singular creative visionary that was Jim Henson. With first-time, unprecedented access into Jim’s own archives, get a look at his early years when he fell in love with puppeteering and made a little green frog named Kermit. Created with household items, Kermit the Frog has become a household name himself. Watch through the years as Jim goes from local television performances to worldwide success with “Sesame Street,” “The Muppet Show” and more creations.

Director Ron Howard offers an insightful look into the complex man whose imagination knew no bounds. He simply inspired the world with his lovable characters. Hear about that restless creativity, ambition and artistic evolution in new interviews with Henson’s closest collaborators and children. His home movies, photographs, sketches and diaries make for a fresh perspective for those in search of “The Rainbow Connection.” The lovers, the dreamers and you can stream “Jim Henson Idea Man” now on Disney+.

How to watch:
